item.description: This walk is on a wide dirt road following the Assabet River on one side and wildlife refuge land on the other. As you walk you hear frogs singing and beavers slapping their tails on the water's surface. This is a lovely walk any evening, and I have chosen to hold it on the full moon.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the intersection of Winter St and Boeske Ave
item.name: Full Moon walk along Assabet River
